get.description: Returns counts, orders and revenue statistics for the dashboard.

post.description:
Telegram WebApp orqali olingan initData ni yuborib foydalanuvchini autentifikatsiya qiladi. 
     *                  Agar foydalanuvchi mavjud bo'lmasa — yangi client sifatida yaratiladi.

get.summary: Get balance history for authenticated user (client or driver)

delete.summary: Cancel an order by the authenticated client

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of the order to cancel

post.summary: Complete an order by the client
post.description: Allows the client to complete a stopped order, transfer deposit to the driver, and notify the driver via event.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: ID of the order to complete

403.description: Client not allowed to complete this order

error.example: You are not allowed to complete this order.

400.description: Order is not stopped and cannot be completed

error.example: Only stopped orders can be completed.

get.summary: List active discounts in the market

post.summary: Purchase a discount using client points

message.example: You do not have enough points to purchase this discount.

get.summary: Get all orders of the authenticated client

200.description: List of client orders retrieved successfully

message.example: Balance is insufficient for deposit payment.

501.description: Discount not found for this client

get.summary: Get a specific order of the authenticated client

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: ID of the order to retrieve

post.description: Assigns the authenticated driver to the given order if all checks pass.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: ID of the order to accept

400.description: Order cannot be accepted due to various business rules

error.example: This order already has a driver assigned.

delete.description: Allows a driver to cancel their assigned order. Completed orders cannot be canceled.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: ID of the order to cancel

409.description: Forbidden / Not allowed (other driver tries to cancel)

error.example: You are not allowed to cancel this order.

403.description: Forbidden / Completed order cannot be canceled

error.example: You cannot cancel a completed order.

get.description: Returns total income, completed orders count, average rating, and recent orders for authenticated driver
Retrieve all active products that can be purchased by drivers.

post.description: Driver purchases a product using points. Points will be deducted if sufficient balance exists.

get.summary: Get all orders for driver's taxopark
get.description: Returns all orders related to the driver's taxopark
Returns orders assigned to the driver, optionally filtered by status

post.description: Allows a driver to start their assigned order. Order must have status 'Accepted'.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: ID of the order to start

400.description: Order cannot be started because it's not accepted

error.example: Only accepted orders can be started.

403.description: Driver not allowed to start this order

error.example: You are not allowed to start this order.

post.summary: Submit a review for a completed order

message.example: You are not allowed to review this order.
You have already reviewed this order.
Referral statistics and points retrieved successfully.

post.summary: Add a referral using a promo code

200.description: Region and its taxoparks retrieved successfully

get.summary: Check for an active route between two taxoparks

value.description: Discount value in percent or currency

created_at.description: When this history record was created

client_id.description: Client ID who left the review

updated_at.description: When the review was last updated

description.example: One free car wash at partner stations.
